about_the_game:
With "Bible Trivia - Legacy", you will have exclusive dialogues with historical characters, exploring their emotions, decisions, and challenges like never before.

📜 What does this DLC add to the game?


✅ 12 new interactive characters: Talk directly with 12 iconic biblical figures.
✅ Immersive dialogues: Discover new stories and unique perspectives through engaging interactions.
✅ Expanded game universe: Dive deeper into the biblical context and see events from a new perspective.

🗣️ New Interactive Characters



  • Abraham: The patriarch of faith, who did not hesitate to follow God's call, even when it meant sacrificing his own son. What went through his mind at that crucial moment? Now you can ask him directly!
  • Sarah: Mother of Isaac and wife of Abraham, who witnessed a miracle in her old age. Sarah has much to share about patience, faith, and even a bit of impatience throughout her journey.
  • Isaac: The son of promise, who grew up in the shadow of his great father and had to carve out his own path. He talks about his journey, challenges, and the difficult task of maintaining the legacy of the divine covenant.
  • Rebekah: A fearless woman whose decision to marry Isaac changed history. She reflects on love, destiny, and the controversial choice to help Jacob receive the birthright blessing.
  • Jacob: The man who deceived, fought, and prevailed, becoming the father of the twelve tribes of Israel. From clever tricks to spiritual battles, Jacob has a lot to tell about his journey full of twists and turns.
  • Joseph: The dreamer betrayed by his brothers, sold into slavery, and against all odds, elevated to governor of Egypt. How did he deal with betrayal, forgiveness, and his incredible rise to power?
  • Lot: Abraham’s nephew, who witnessed the destruction of Sodom. Between dramatic memories and a touch of humor about his unexpected escape, he shares a unique perspective on his experience.
  • Esau: The brother who sold his birthright for a bowl of lentils. Today, he reflects on the consequences of his decision and whether it was really worth it.
  • Rachel & Leah: Two sisters trapped in a complicated marriage with Jacob. While Rachel talks about love and sacrifice, Leah shares her practical view of life and her importance in forming the nation of Israel.
  • Melchizedek: The mysterious king-priest of Salem, who blessed Abraham and then vanished from history. He has much to say about his role and the significance of the eternal priesthood.
  • Hagar: Sarah's servant and Ishmael's mother, who faced immense challenges with faith and courage. Her story is a testimony of resilience in difficult times.

📌 Requirements


🔹 Requires the base game "Bible Trivia" to access this additional content.

short_description: Imagine being Abraham, ready to sacrifice his son, or Isaac, confused by it all. And Joseph? Sold by his brothers but rising to rule Egypt! You’ve read this in the Bible, but have you wondered what the patriarchs would say? Hear their story like never before!
supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Spain, Russian
